name: zen-notes
description: Zen is a self-hosted personal productivity and journaling app that blends tasks, notes, and reflections in a calm interface. It aims to reduce friction and distraction while tracking daily work and thoughts.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Create and organize tasks with due dates, priorities, and completion tracking in a minimal interface

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Format notes and tasks using Markdown syntax for structured, readable content

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: Visualize tasks and journal entries on a calendar to understand workload and patterns

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find past notes and tasks quickly with full-text search across all content

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize notes and tasks with custom tags for flexible filtering and grouping
